snippet.title: Marble Legends Trailer (iOS-Androïd)
snippet.description:
Marble Legends is coming! 

The millenium game comes back renewed to recover the magic of the traditional marble game, with a lot of action and challenges, now at your fingertips to play and enjoy anytime, anywhere. Get and build your marbles, defy gravity in every shoot, break records with your friends and overcome the limits of knowledge through the legends of Marbles. 

Are you ready to live this legendary adventure?

Key Features:
• +100 Levels & Tons of Marbles Designs!
• Single player & Multiplayer Mode (Async)
• Special events to collect new marbles
• Multiplayer Arenas to play with friends!
• Factory: Build your own Marbles
• Marble Shop & Trade System
• Leveling Marbles by XP, quality & aging!
• Use Marblecoins and the extremely difficult to find Marbliums to unlock lots of action and fun!
• Master all the Legendary Achievements
• Become World’s Top Ten Marble Player!
• Live a full experience of this legendary adventure!

Copyright © 2016 UNTREF Media/Spawn Digital SAS. All rights reserved.
